moduleMetadataJson.name: Web browsers HSTS entries eraser
moduleMetadataJson.description:
This module removes the HSTS database of the following tools and web browsers: Mozilla Firefox,
        Google Chrome, Opera, Safari and wget.
author: Sheila A. Berta (UnaPibaGeek)

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: DISCLAIMER
options.description: This module will delete HSTS data from the target. Set this parameter to True in order to accept this warning.
